title: Heading as the strategy execution officer
challenge: Kindled is a service and product based mental wellness startup in Kerala. We want to focus on both the service side and the app side at the same time, increase app downloads, and increase footfall for our offline programs.
solution: Developed a comprehensive product and service based marketing and sales strategy that gives importance to SSM and SEM. The plan directs new generation tech friendly leads into the app and guides traditional consultation seekers to the service team. I also created a strategy for social media engagement with fun elements to encourage people to interact and respond.

title: The 'Unparent' Viral Movement
challenge: Mental health marketing often feels clinical and cold. Kindled needed to reach parents of toddlers in a way that felt supportive, not judgmental.
solution: We launched 'Unparent'—an offline camp supported by an emotional digital campaign. We used raw, unfiltered parenting stories on Instagram to build community trust before the event launch.

title: Scaling Startup User Acquisition
challenge: Dotco had a great MVP but zero users. They needed rapid acquisition with a very limited budget.
solution: We implemented a 'High-Velocity Testing' framework. Running micro-campaigns across SEM and Social to find the lowest cost-per-acquisition (CPA) channel, then scaling it aggressively.

title: Marketing Strategist Driving Growth for RISE TBI
challenge: RISE TBI needed to increase footfall, event participation, and workspace conversions in a competitive startup ecosystem. Despite strong programs like Elevate and Evolve, awareness, engagement, and lead conversion across the student and local entrepreneur community were inconsistent.
solution: I developed a complete, data-driven marketing strategy for RISE TBI that covered acquisition, engagement, and conversion. I created targeted funnels to reach the right audience, designed high-engagement campaigns for incubation programs and events, and implemented conversion-focused messaging with performance tracking. This approach increased event participation, improved daily footfall, and converted visitors into paying workspace users, directly boosting TBI’s revenue and ecosystem activity.

title: Cronomind AI – Pre-Sales Automation Product
challenge: Cronomind AI needed a scalable marketing and sales system capable of generating consistent, high-quality leads from Google and social media while converting them efficiently into customers. As a new product, the brand required stronger visibility and a reliable acquisition engine to support early revenue.
solution: I created a comprehensive SEM, SMM, and sales strategy focused on high-intent lead generation and measurable conversions. I structured performance-driven campaigns across search and social platforms and built a conversion-optimized funnel tailored to the pre-sales automation audience. This strategy helped convert digital traffic into qualified customers and enabled strong early revenue growth for the product.
